HOME.TITLE: Home
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Mockos is a useful and practical tool for developers looking to test their applications with customized API mocks, collaboratively and without installing anything on their computer.

CREATE.TITLE: A simple yet complete way to mock JSON responses and files
CREATE.DESCRIPTION: Allows editing JSON with an easy-to-use, error-proof editor. You can also upload files up to 8 MB (configurable).

COMPARE.TITLE: Fully reactive and collaborative functionality, no more configuration files
COMPARE.DESCRIPTION: No need to share and maintain messy configuration files anymore, stay agile even when mocking APIs.

INVITE.TITLE: Invite your friends to the party! They might not accept... But that's okay!
INVITE.DESCRIPTION: Mocking can be tricky, but it's much easier and more fun with friends! Take advantage of Mockos' fully-equipped friend system!

BRANCH.TITLE: Not in the mood for socializing? We’ve got something for you! Now you can branch out and work on your own.
BRANCH.DESCRIPTION: Making changes that might break someone’s code? Create a project branch and merge when you're ready.

HOME.HEADER_1: Build Mocks for your API with no code or configuration files
HOME.HEADER_2: Mockos is a useful and practical tool for developers looking to test their applications with customized API mocks, collaboratively and without installing anything on their computer.

VERIFY.TITLE_SUCCESSFUL: Your account has been successfully verified. Please log in using the button below.
VERIFY.TITLE_FAILURE: The verification link is not valid. Try again later.

DASHBOARD.DELETE_PROJECT_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete {{project}}?
DASHBOARD.DELETE_PROJECT_MESSAGE_MULTIPLE: The selected projects include: {{projects}}. This action is irreversible. Are you sure?

ROUTES.SELECT_ROUTE: Please select a route from the list
ROUTES.DELETE_ROUTE_TITLE: Are you sure you want to delete this route?
ROUTES.DELETE_ROUTE_MESSAGE: The route {{name}} and its responses will be permanently deleted
ROUTES.DELETE_FOLDER_TITLE: Are you sure you want to delete this folder?
ROUTES.DELETE_FOLDER_MESSAGE: The folder {{name}} will be deleted, but its contents will not. Everything will be moved to the parent context.
ROUTES.DELETE_TITLE: Are you sure you want to delete {{element}}?
ROUTES.RESPONSES_NOT_FOUND: You haven't created any responses yet
ROUTES.INVALID_JSON: This JSON might not be valid
ROUTES.RESPONSE_UNEXPECTEDLY_DELETED: The response you were editing has been deleted... Now it's as if you are creating a new one
ROUTES.NEW_CHANGES: There are new changes for this response
ROUTES.FORKING_PROJECT: You are forking the project. You will be the only member, but it works like any other normal project.
ROUTES.EMPTY_JSON: You need a body, if you want it empty use {} or ""
ROUTES.HEADERS_HINT: Technically, responses always come with a minimum set of headers. For example, the default content-type is 'application/json' for text or 'application/octet-stream' for files.
ROUTES.DUPLICATE_RESPONSE_DESCRIPTION: You are about to duplicate a response, including its body, status, and headers.
ROUTES.DELETE_TOKEN_DESCRIPTION: By deleting this token, all clients using it will no longer be able to connect to Mockos.
ROUTES.MISSING_TOKENS: No tokens available for this project
ROUTES.TOKENS_HINT: You will not be able to use Mockos from unauthenticated clients
ROUTES.CREATE_TOKEN_DESCRIPTION: You can use these tokens to authenticate from any client
ROUTES.DELETE_RESPONSE_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete this response?
ROUTES.DELETE_SELECTED_RESPONSES_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete the selected responses?
ROUTES.EDITOR_DESCRIPTION: The response is in file mode. It can return either a file or text, but not both. Please delete the file if you want to switch back to text mode.

MEMBERS.LEAVE_PROJECT_TITLE: Do you want to leave the project?
MEMBERS.LEAVE_PROJECT_MESSAGE: If you leave the project, you will need to be invited again to modify and use the mocks

INVITATIONS.GO_BACK: Go back to the project list
INVITATIONS.TITLE: Projects you have been invited to
INVITATIONS.ACCEPT_MESSAGE: This action CAN be reversed simply by leaving the project later
INVITATIONS.NOT_INVITED: You have not been invited to any project
INVITATIONS.REJECT_TITLE: Do you want to reject the invitation to {{project}}?
INVITATIONS.REJECT_MESSAGE: If you change your mind, they will have to invite you again

USER.UPDATE_USER_DESCRIPTION: Information about how other users see you in their member list
USER.UPDATE_EMAIL_DESCRIPTION: We will send a confirmation email to your new address; once verified, it will become the email associated with your account

CONTRACTS.INVALID_VERSION: Your version {{local}} is INVALID or NOT GREATER than the remote version {{remote}}
CONTRACTS.ROLLBACK_TITLE: Are you sure you want to roll back to {{version}}?
CONTRACTS.ROLLBACK_MESSAGE: This update was made by {{author}} on {{date}} at {{time}}. All versions after this one will be deleted.

PROJECTS.CREATE_NEW_PROJECT: You don't have any projects yet, it's time to create one

ERRORS.PATTERN: This field does not have the correct format!
